title: RITO supports boosting
body:
As title
Just had a game at low Plat tier, opening OP.GG and guess what.

3 players in 10 are boosting, all 3 accounts has similar traits, Low Bronze seasonal tiers, now playing against high Golds and low Plats, with 80%+ win rate at all lanes.

I mean, if you do play the game, you will know this is either account sharing or boosting.
And if you think this is the same account owner from Bronze? there is something wrong with you.

And I'm positive now RIOT supports BOOSTING.

There are 25+ boosting service out there has OCE server on their list.
South Korea passed law against boosting, 2 years of imprisonment or fine up to 20,000 US$.
Ya RITO supports criminals.

But RIOT supports criminals by doing nothing at all, literally 70% of the games has player accounts either from Bronze and playing at Plats with 80%+ win rate, or Diamond player account playing in Plats feeding and 30% win rate[boosted]

At this point it's obvious, even a foreign country passed a law that ranking game created[most played like League/overwatch etc]
but at least overwatch are strict with their player behavior control and ban cheaters, league is just slacking, supporting boosting by doing nothing at all.
Already some gaming intense country passed laws to fight against what RIOT has let free and supporting, shameful money hugging game industry.

At this point of 8 years playing since beta, I'm convinced RIOT supports boosting, , since 70% of them games are not balanced, and I will start my campaign to boost to gold for easy cash since I can get to Plat easy, and never ever get caught since RITO doesn't care about players anymore, you don't give us a decent community while you could with all your resources, we will became the boosters that fuck up this game and make it die soon enough

Good bye good old friend, you made me do this, but it's ok, I get cash by playing a free game, and my bronze/silver clients will buy all your skins for digital ego as theri fake tier I brought for them.
And good to know as long as I don't go to south Korea and admit I boost, I ain't a criminal, I just provide bronze children with digital ego for cash out of RITO's lack of management haha.
WIN WIN for all other boosters for the last 8 years I guess, why didn't I thought of this sooner lol
I guess I didn't have to get bitter quitting as a decent player, but wells, I WAS A LOYAL ONE ACCOUNT NO SMURF NO AFK NO TOXIC PLAYER, RITO drove me away from wanting to play fair, and thats it.

Also, 8 years and you're still in plat? Holy shit!
